name: Pokémon Shattered Dimensions
storyline:
A family travels to a new place, because one of them will have to move there in a year for study reasons, and they must look for a good house where they can live. A few days later, two brothers begin a challenge, which consists of collecting 9 passes that are given to winners of small tournaments in the cities, in order to have the opportunity to participate in a festival where they will face the best.

With the intention of winning, the protagonist embarks on his journey with a little Shinx, who was his gift for his twelfth birthday. However, a sinister figure appears with hostile intentions. Familiar and new faces await you.
summary:
Dive in a new story featuring journeys between different dimensions, with two regions to explore and graphics inspired by the titles of the 3rd gen.

If you were offered a second chance, would you take it? What would you be willing to sacrifice for someone you love?
